sentences.en: Bar fencing and boxing I had few athletic tastes.
sentences.cn: 除剑术和拳击之外,其他运动我不太喜欢.

sentences.en: Foil, epee and sabre are the three weapons used in fencing competitions.
sentences.cn: 在击剑比赛中使用花剑 、 重剑和佩剑三种剑.

sentences.en: Full fencing uniform and gear are prepared by participants. No Shorts allowed.
sentences.cn: 参赛者必须自备全套剑击制服及比赛器材, 不能穿著短裤比赛.

sentences.en: He is an old hand at fencing.
I did a bit of fencing while I was at college.
sentences.cn: 我在大学时偶尔玩玩击剑.

sentences.en: Perimeter fencing should enclose the areas around cargo handling and storage facilities.
sentences.cn: 货物搬运和存放设施的区域四周必须用围栏包围起来.

sentences.en: The factory is surrounded by electric fencing.
The fencing has been delivered to the site.
sentences.cn: 筑篱材料已经运到工地.

sentences.en: The fencing of the farm was in poor repair.
The governor was an expert at fencing with reporters.
sentences.cn: 这位州长是搪塞新闻记者的能手.

sentences.en: The guards were removing a section of fencing to let it through.
sentences.cn: 警卫在拆除一段围栏好让它通过。

sentences.en: They ended up ripping down perimeter fencing and tussling with the security staff.
sentences.cn: 最终他们拆毁了四周的围栏，与保安人员厮打起来。

sentences.en: What is modern pentathlon? Equestrianism, fencing, swimming, shooting and cross - country race.
sentences.cn: 现代五项是 什么 ?马术 、 击剑 、 游泳 、 射击和 越野 跑.

sentences.en: Who lays down the rules for international fencing competitions?
sentences.cn: 谁负责制定国际比赛规则?

words.tran_cn: 击剑者；剑术家；（澳）篱笆匠
击剑；搪塞；围以栅栏；跳过栅栏
防护；用篱笆围住；练习剑术

phrases.tran_cn: 越过场端；不讲道理的 ，不公正的
保持中立；采取骑墙态度

trans.tran_cn: 剑术，围墙，筑栅栏的材料
trans.tran_en: the sport of fighting with a long thin sword

trans.tran_cn: 击剑( fence的现在分词)，围以栅栏
